title: Firefox y su excesivo consumo de ram en linux
content:
Reciban un codial saludo, estos dos meses me pase de windows a zorin OS y siempre he usado en firefox , durante este periodo medi cuenta que el sonsumo de ram es zorin es mucho mayor que en windows cuando uno inicia en windows sin extenciones en limipio su consumo es de solo 415MB con la pagina de gogole abierta , pero en firefox se dispara a 1.15 GB sin extenciones sin nada , solo esa ventana abierta , eso es absurdo, no se por que lo hace y me gustaria saber , y abrir mas pestañlas ni se diga , me a llegado a consumir hatsa 13GB de ram en zorin es una locura.

que puede ser? por que consume mas en linux que en windows? abra solucion de ese problema algun dia?

title: How to Name Correction on American Ticket~ Hotline for Quick Service {A1A}
content: +1-888-217-8731 If you need to make a name correction on your American Airlines ticket, the fastest way to get this done is by calling +1-888-217-8731. Whether you’ve misspelled your name, need to adjust it due to marriage, or are correcting a passenger detail for any other reason, American Airlines customer service is ready to assist you. To get started, dial +1-888-217-8731, and you will be connected to a live representative who can guide you through the name correction process. You’ll need to provide your booking reference number, your original name on the ticket, and the correct name. If the change is due to legal reasons (like marriage), you may need to provide supporting documents such as a marriage certificate. The agent will also verify your identification details to ensure accuracy. American Airlines typically allows small name corrections, such as fixing a misspelled name, without any additional cost. However, significant changes—such as adjusting your name after marriage or a legal name change—may involve extra charges, depending on your ticket type and the nature of the modification. When you contact +1-888-217-8731, the agent will inform you of any potential fees and help you decide the best way forward. Once the name correction is processed, you will receive an updated boarding pass with the correct name, ensuring a smooth check-in and boarding experience. It’s important to make these corrections well in advance of your travel date to allow American Airlines sufficient time to update your ticket and make the necessary changes to your reservation. By contacting +1-888-217-8731, you can rest assured that your name will be corrected promptly and accurately. Don’t wait—call now to ensure your American Airlines ticket is updated with the correct information.
creator: shifasharminakter

title: Proposta di implementazione della funzione “Sottotitoli in tempo reale” su Firefox / Proposal for implementing “Real-time Captions” feature in Firefox
content:
Gentile Team Mozilla, vi scrivo per sottoporvi una proposta che ritengo molto importante per migliorare l’accessibilità e l’inclusione digitale: l’implementazione della funzione “sottotitoli in tempo reale” direttamente nel browser Firefox. Questa funzione, già presente in Google Chrome, permette di generare automaticamente sottotitoli per qualsiasi contenuto audio o video riprodotto nel browser, indipendentemente dalla piattaforma o dal servizio di origine. Sarebbe quindi estremamente utile per tutte le persone sorde o con difficoltà uditive, ma anche per chi vive in contesti dove l’audio non è sempre disponibile o utilizzabile. Introdurre i sottotitoli in tempo reale su Firefox rappresenterebbe un passo decisivo verso l’accessibilità universale, garantendo a milioni di utenti la possibilità di fruire dei contenuti online senza barriere. Una funzionalità simile non solo rafforzerebbe la missione di Mozilla per un web aperto e inclusivo, ma darebbe anche un segnale concreto di attenzione alle esigenze reali delle persone. Vi ringrazio per l’attenzione e spero che questa proposta possa essere presa in considerazione per i futuri sviluppi di Firefox. Cordiali saluti.


Dear Mozilla Team, I am writing to propose an important feature that would greatly improve accessibility and digital inclusion in Firefox: the implementation of real-time captions directly in the browser. This feature, already available in Google Chrome, automatically generates subtitles for any audio or video content played within the browser, regardless of the platform or service. It would therefore be extremely valuable not only for deaf or hard-of-hearing users, but also for anyone in situations where audio cannot be played or easily understood. Introducing real-time captions in Firefox would represent a major step toward universal accessibility, ensuring that millions of users can enjoy online content without barriers. Such a feature would not only strengthen Mozilla’s mission for an open and inclusive web, but also demonstrate a tangible commitment to meeting real user needs. Thank you for your attention, and I hope this proposal can be considered for future versions of Firefox. Sincerely.

title: How Can You Quickly Reach Skylux Travel for Assistance with Your Booking?
content: Introduction SkyLux Travel is a well-known agency specializing in discounted business and first-class tickets call us on 888-429-4105, corporate travel packages, and tailored premium services. Travelers rely on SkyLux Travel because it provides exclusive deals and dedicated customer support around the clock. Yet, like with any travel service, situations arise where speaking to a live representative is essential. Whether it’s last-minute cancellations, upgrades, or refund requests, having the correct SkyLux Travel contact number can make all the difference. This article provides you with all the contact details of SkyLux Travel—from phone lines to emails and international support channels—while emphasizing why calling directly is often the fastest way to resolve your issues. Along the way, we’ll also cover best practices for reaching an agent quickly and tips to make your call more productive. ________________________________________ Why Customers Contact SkyLux Travel There are multiple reasons passengers prefer to contact SkyLux Travel directly: • Booking assistance: Clarifying itineraries, confirming fare rules, or securing business class upgrades. • Flight changes and cancellations: Adjusting itineraries due to emergencies or airline rescheduling. • Refunds and vouchers: Processing unused tickets or partially used itineraries. • Special service requests: Meal preferences, medical assistance, or extra baggage. • Corporate and group travel: Companies and organizations require dedicated support for bulk bookings. The breadth of situations shows why SkyLux Travel’s contact numbers are so valuable. ________________________________________ SkyLux Travel Phone Numbers Here are the verified SkyLux Travel numbers: • Reservations / Main Toll-Free Line (US & Canada): 888-429-4105 • Customer Service / Support: 888-429-4105 • Spanish-Speaking Line: 888-429-4105 • UK Support: 888-429-4105 • Australia Support: 888-429-4105 • Hong Kong Support: +888-429-4105 • Singapore Support: +888-429-4105 Calling the toll-free U.S. numbers is the fastest route for most North American customers, while international travelers can use their regional access numbers. ________________________________________ Best Times to Call SkyLux Travel Although SkyLux advertises 24/7 support, peak periods can increase hold times. To reduce waiting: • Call early mornings or late evenings (local time). • Avoid Monday mornings and Friday evenings, which are typically busiest. • If overseas, check U.S. business hours for quicker routing to available agents. ________________________________________ Preparing Before You Call To make your interaction smoother: • Keep your booking reference / ticket number handy. • Have your passport details if calling about international travel. • Note down the dates, flight numbers, and desired changes before the call. • Have a payment method ready in case you need to pay fare differences or fees. ________________________________________ Other Ways to Contact SkyLux Travel While calling is the most direct method, SkyLux also offers alternative channels: • Email: cs@skyluxtravel.com • Live Chat: Available through the official website • Contact Form: Accessible via the support page • Social Media: Agents sometimes respond to Facebook or Twitter messages For non-urgent matters, emails and the web contact form are effective, though slower than a phone call. ________________________________________ Common Issues Resolved Over the Phone Here are scenarios where calling SkyLux Travel is best: • Last-minute changes: Switching flights on short notice. • Refund requests: Clarifying refund eligibility and timelines. • Upgrade requests: Securing business or first-class seats. • Travel disruptions: Handling cancellations, delays, or missed connections. • Corporate accounts: Assistance with bulk bookings and invoicing. ________________________________________ SkyLux Travel for Special Assistance SkyLux caters to special requirements: • Group travel management • Medical or disability accommodations • Frequent flyer and loyalty program support • Corporate travel planning In each of these cases, calling a dedicated phone agent ensures personal assistance. ________________________________________ Frequently Asked Questions Is SkyLux Travel available 24/7 by phone? Yes, they promote round-the-clock availability. However, wait times vary depending on demand. Can I cancel my SkyLux booking by phone? Yes, cancellations and changes are handled over the phone for faster processing. What if I need Spanish-speaking support? Call 888-664-0054 for Spanish-language assistance. Do international travelers have separate numbers? Yes. Use the UK, Australia, Hong Kong, or Singapore lines listed above. How long do refunds take? Refunds vary depending on airline policy but typically take 7–14 business days. ________________________________________ Why Calling SkyLux Travel Works Best Although digital contact methods exist, calling SkyLux Travel remains the fastest and most reliable channel. Live representatives can: • Instantly confirm availability. • Provide accurate fee or fare calculations. • Escalate urgent issues without back-and-forth emails. If your trip is near or you face disruptions, a direct call is the most effective solution. ________________________________________ Conclusion When travel plans change or urgent questions arise, knowing the right SkyLux Travel phone number saves time and stress. For U.S. travelers, call 8884294105 for new bookings and 855-507-9771 for ongoing issues. Spanish speakers should use 888-429-4105, while international customers can rely on the regional lines. The next time you need fast, reliable support, make the call. SkyLux Travel’s dedicated agents are ready to assist you around the clock. ________________________________________

title: How Can You Quickly Resolve Your Skylux Travel Booking Changes or Cancellations?
content:
Introduction • SkyLux Travel-888-429-4105 

provides premium and luxury travel services, but even the most meticulously planned trips can require changes or cancellations. Whether due to personal emergencies, flight delays, or schedule adjustments, contacting the Skylux Changes & Cancellation Department quickly ensures your issue is resolved efficiently.

This article details the phone numbers, alternative contact methods, and best practices for reaching the department, emphasizing why calling is the fastest way to get assistance. ________________________________________ Why Customers Need the Changes & Cancellation Department Travel plans can change for various reasons: • Last-minute schedule adjustments: Flights may conflict with other commitments. • Emergencies: Medical or family emergencies require immediate cancellations. • Flight delays or cancellations: Airlines may adjust schedules, triggering a need for rebooking. • Special requests: Seat upgrades, itinerary modifications, or combining bookings. • Refunds and vouchers: Customers need guidance on refundable tickets or travel credits. Because of these situations, the department receives high call volumes, making it essential to know the right number. ________________________________________ Skylux Changes & Cancellation Department Phone Numbers Here are the verified contact numbers: • U.S. Toll-Free (Changes & Cancellations): 888-429-4105 • Customer Service for General Queries: 888-429-4105 • Spanish Support: 888-429-4105 • UK Support: 888-429-4105 • Australia Support: 888-429-4105 • Hong Kong Support: 888-429-4105 • Singapore Support: 888-429-4105 Calling the dedicated department number (888-429-4105) ensures your requests are prioritized and resolved faster than general inquiries. ________________________________________ Best Times to Call To minimize wait times: • Early morning or late evening local times. • Avoid peak days like Monday mornings or Fridays. • International callers should check U.S. office hours for faster routing. ________________________________________ Preparing Before You Call Before contacting the Changes & Cancellation Department: • Have your booking reference or ticket number ready. • Keep your passport or ID handy if international travel is involved. • Know your preferred resolution: date changes, seat upgrades, or refund type. • Be ready for payment adjustments if fare differences apply. ________________________________________ Alternative Ways to Contact While calling is fastest, you can also use: • Email: cs@skyluxtravel.com • Live Chat: Via the official website for quick responses. • Web Contact Form: Useful for non-urgent requests. • Social Media Channels: Facebook or Twitter messages sometimes receive responses from agents. These methods are suitable for non-urgent inquiries, but phone calls are recommended for immediate action. ________________________________________ Common Issues Handled by the Department • Flight changes: Adjusting departure or arrival dates. • Cancellations: Full or partial ticket cancellations. • Refunds: Clarifying eligibility, processing timelines. • Vouchers and credits: Applying unused tickets to future travel. • Emergency itinerary adjustments: Last-minute travel changes due to unexpected events. ________________________________________ Tips for a Smooth Call • Have all relevant documents ready. • Be polite but clear about your request. • If the issue is urgent, ask to escalate to a senior agent. • Take note of the agent’s name and reference number for follow-up. ________________________________________ Frequently Asked Questions Can I cancel a Skylux booking by phone? Yes, calling the dedicated number ensures a quicker response than emails or forms. How long does it take to process a refund? Typically 7–14 business days, depending on airline policies. Is the Changes & Cancellation Department available 24/7? Yes, although wait times may vary by demand. Do I need to call the general support line or the dedicated number? Use 888-429-4105 for changes & cancellations to get prioritized service. Can I speak Spanish? Yes, dial 888-664-0054 for Spanish-speaking support. ________________________________________ Why Calling Works Best • Immediate clarification of rules and fees. • Agents can confirm changes or cancellations instantly. • Urgent situations are prioritized. • Reduces email back-and-forth delays. ________________________________________ Conclusion For fast and reliable resolution of Skylux Travel changes or cancellations, calling the dedicated department number (888-429-4105) is your best option. Make sure to prepare all booking details and preferred adjustments before calling. Spanish speakers should 888-429-4105, while international travelers have specific regional lines.

title: Request for Clarification on Firefox Saved Logins and Account Syncing
content:
Dear Mozilla Firefox Support,

I am seeking clarification and assistance regarding saved login details that appear in my Firefox browser, both on my laptop.

The situation is as follows:

At some point in the past, I mus thave attempted to access the Plenty of Fish (POF) dating site via the app on my iPhone. Alhtough not presently active, my iCloud account shows a history of the app being downloaded, and stored in the cloud.

I do not recall ever completing an account setup or using the service, but when I check Firefox on my laptop, I can see a username and password saved under Privacy & Security settings for POF.

I am trying to understand whether these saved credentials could have been synced between my iPhone and my laptop at the time of the attempted registration, meaning that they were stored automatically even if I did not intentionally log in on my laptop.

My specific questions are:

Do the Firefox saved logins on my laptop and my iPhone interlink automatically if Firefox Sync is enabled? (i.e., would login data entered on my phone app/browser be stored in the Firefox passwords list on my laptop?)

Is it possible to determine whether the saved username/password for POF was stored via the iPhone app/browser rather than being typed directly on the laptop?

I belive that if login attempts fail due to a non-existent or corrupted username/password, Firefox still store the login attempt details (username and password) even if the login itself did not succeed, can you confirm this? Is there a way of telling which it was failed/sucessful

This is a sensitive and personal matter, and I would greatly appreciate your guidance and any clarification on how Firefox may have stored or synced these details.

Thank you for your support.

Kind regards, A

title: Apparaataanmelding voor invullen en beheren van wachtwoorden vereisen werkt niet bij mij
content:
Beste Mozilla Support,

Ik heb een probleem met de "Apparaataanmelding" functie in Firefox. De functie werkt niet zoals verwacht, terwijl dezezelfde beveiliging wel correct werkt in Google Chrome op dezelfde computer.

Mijn configuratie:

Firefox versie: [voeg hier je Firefox-versie in - vind je via Menu > Help > Over Firefox]

Besturingssysteem: Windows 11

Windows Hello: Pincode is ingesteld en werkt voor Chrome

Het probleem: Ik heb de volgende instellingen ingeschakeld in Firefox:

✅ "Apparaataanmelding voor invullen en beheren van wachtwoorden vereisen"

❌ "Een hoofdwachtwoord gebruiken" (uitgeschakeld)

✅ "Windows-single-sign-on toestaan"

Toch vraagt Firefox niet om mijn Windows Hello pincode wanneer:

Wachtwoorden automatisch worden ingevuld op websites

Ik de wachtwoordbeheerder open

Wat ik al heb geprobeerd:

Firefox volledig afsluiten en opnieuw starten

De apparaataanmelding-instelling uit- en weer aanzetten

Controleren of Windows Hello correct werkt (werkt wel in Chrome)

Verschillende websites getest waar wachtwoorden zijn opgeslagen

Firefox-profiel opnieuw gemaakt

Belangrijke details:

Ik gebruik een schoolaccount op deze laptop, wat aanvankelijk Windows Hello blokkeerde

Na het verifiëren van mijn schoolgegevens werkt Windows Hello nu in Chrome

De foutmelding "Deze pincode werkt niet voor de bronnen van uw organisatie" is opgelost

Kan u mij helpen begrijpen waarom Firefox de apparaataanmelding negeert, terwijl Chrome deze correct gebruikt? Ik wil graag dat Firefox mijn Windows Hello pincode vraagt voordat wachtwoorden worden ingevuld.

Bedankt voor uw hulp!

Met vriendelijke groet

title: Budget Air Contact: How to Reach Fast ?
content:
If you need quick help with flights, refunds, cancellations, rebookings, or itinerary changes, calling Budget Air contact support at 1‑888‑429‑4105 is one of the fastest ways to get answers. Whether you booked a budget ticket, need to fix traveler details, or want to explore cheaper fare options, the Budget Air contact line at 1‑888‑429‑4105 can walk you through your options step by step.

---

      1. Why call Budget Air contact support at 1‑888‑429‑4105?

- Immediate assistance for urgent travel problems - Guidance on cancellations and change policies - Help applying flight credits and vouchers - Fare difference explanations and reissue fees - Support with baggage rules and seat selection - Help with travel add‑ons, insurance, and special services

Save time by dialing 1‑888‑429‑4105 and keeping your booking reference, passenger name, and payment method handy. If you’re stuck at an airport, the Budget Air contact number 1‑888‑429‑4105 can also coordinate with the airline on your behalf when possible.

---

      1. Common issues the team can handle at 1‑888‑429‑4105

- Name corrections and traveler detail updates - Flight cancellations and refund eligibility checks - Date and time changes for upcoming flights - Schedule change notifications and reaccommodation - Multi‑city or complex itinerary support - Payment verification and invoice requests - Special assistance, infants, and group bookings

For any of these scenarios, calling the Budget Air contact line at 1‑888‑429‑4105 ensures you get tailored, real‑time guidance.

---

      1. Tips for faster resolutions when you call 1‑888‑429‑4105

- Have your booking confirmation or PNR ready - Confirm your full name exactly as on your ID - Know your preferred new dates and times ahead of time - Check airline change and baggage policies in advance - If you want a refund, ask about processing timelines and method - Keep your email inbox open for verification links while on the call

Budget travelers often face tight timelines and limited fare flexibility. A quick conversation through the Budget Air contact center at 1‑888‑429‑4105 can clarify fare rules and help you avoid extra costs.

---

      1. Changes, cancellations, and refunds

Policies vary by airline, fare type, and timing. Generally:

- Basic or saver fares can be restrictive - Standard economy may allow changes with a fee plus fare difference - Refundable fares offer more flexibility - Schedule changes by the airline may open no‑fee options

To understand exactly what applies to your ticket, call the Budget Air contact team at 1‑888‑429‑4105. An agent can look up your booking, show you eligible options, and process the change during the same call.

---

      1. Baggage, seats, and extras

Budget tickets often exclude extras by default. If you want to add:

- Checked baggage - Seat selection or extra legroom - Priority boarding - Meals, Wi‑Fi, or other onboard services

The Budget Air contact number 1‑888‑429‑4105 can help compare costs and add services directly when available. This helps avoid airport counter markups and last‑minute surprises.

---

      1. If your plans changed last minute

Missed a flight or facing a same‑day disruption? Call 1‑888‑429‑4105 as soon as possible. Agents can:

- Check same‑day or next‑day availability - Explain standby or reaccommodation options - Provide documentation if you need to file insurance claims - Coordinate with the airline when policy allows

The earlier you contact Budget Air at 1‑888‑429‑4105, the more options you typically have.

---

      1. Security, verification, and payment help

If a payment declined, a charge seems unfamiliar, or you need a formal invoice, the Budget Air contact line at 1‑888‑429‑4105 can verify transactions securely. Keep your last four digits of the payment method, billing ZIP or postal code, and any bank alerts ready for faster verification.

---

      1. Frequently asked questions about Budget Air contact at 1‑888‑429‑4105

- Can I change my flight over the phone? 

 Yes, if your fare permits it. The agent at 1‑888‑429‑4105 can quote fees and fare differences, then process the change.

- How long do refunds take? 

 Timelines depend on airline policies and payment method. The Budget Air contact center at 1‑888‑429‑4105 can provide the latest estimate after reviewing your booking.

- Do I call 1‑888‑429‑4105 for baggage questions? 

 Yes, for fare‑related baggage rules and pre‑purchase options. For airport‑specific handling, the airline or airport desk may provide final confirmation.

- Can you help with schedule change emails? 

 Absolutely. Call 1‑888‑429‑4105, reference the email you received, and an agent can discuss reaccommodation choices.

- Is there support for group and family bookings? 

 Yes. The Budget Air contact team at 1‑888‑429‑4105 can help align seats, add infant travelers, or coordinate multiple tickets.

---

      1. Quick checklist before you dial 1‑888‑429‑4105

- Booking reference and traveler details ready - Preferred new dates or times if changing - Payment method available for any fees - Email and phone accessible for verification - Flexibility on alternate airports or routings

When you need clear answers and fast action on a budget itinerary, call the Budget Air contact number 1‑888‑429‑4105. Having your details ready will make the call smooth, help you understand your options, and get you on your way with minimal hassle.

title: Firefox hangs whenever "Creative Cloud Helper" process is open
content: Hello, I'm running MacOS Sequoia 15.5 on a Mac Studio with Firefox version 143.0.1. Ever since I installed Adobe Creative Cloud, Firefox has been hanging on startup. The way I've found to temporarily resolve it is by closing the Creative Cloud software and manually killing the Creative Cloud Helper process, but I would rather not have to do this every time I start my computer. When Firefox is hanging, the 3 processes that use the most CPU are "fontd", "Firefox", and "Creative Cloud Helper". I would assume it's something to do with fonts, but I have no idea how to fix it.

To download Firefox with new version I have to use another browser but no choice. Then with new version of Firefox, I have faced the same issue of update and used same approach to update firefox to a newer version.

This error appears for some google sites as well but the same occurring for firefox download site itself is not understood.

title: YouTube
content:
समस्या: "YouTube पर वीडियो चलाने में हमेशा दिक्कत होती है।"

इसे और बेहतर तरीके से कैसे बता सकते हैं:

वीडियो का अटक-अटक कर चलना (Choppy Playback): "YouTube पर कोई भी वीडियो चलाता हूँ, तो वह लगातार नहीं चलता। वीडियो रुक-रुक कर चलता है, जैसे कोई अटक-अटक कर बोल रहा हो। ऐसा लगता है कि वीडियो आगे-पीछे हो रहा है और स्मूथली नहीं चल रहा।"

बफरिंग की समस्या (Buffering Issues): "जब मैं कोई वीडियो शुरू करता हूँ, तो वह तुरंत नहीं चलता। स्क्रीन पर बीच में एक गोल घूमने वाला निशान (Buffering icon) आता रहता है। वीडियो कुछ सेकंड चलता है, फिर रुक जाता है, फिर बफर होता है, और यह चक्र बार-बार चलता रहता है। इससे वीडियो देखने का मज़ा खराब हो जाता है।"

वीडियो की क्वालिटी का बार-बार बदलना (Changing Video Quality): "मैंने वीडियो को 1080p (हाई क्वालिटी) पर सेट किया है, लेकिन कुछ देर बाद वह अपने आप कम क्वालिटी (जैसे 480p या 360p) पर चला जाता है। स्क्रीन धुंधली हो जाती है। फिर थोड़ी देर बाद क्वालिटी ठीक हो जाती है, और फिर से खराब हो जाती है।"

आवाज़ और वीडियो का तालमेल बिगड़ना (Audio-Video Sync Issues): "वीडियो चल रहा है, लेकिन उसकी आवाज़ वीडियो से मैच नहीं कर रही। कभी आवाज़ पहले आ जाती है और वीडियो बाद में चलता है, या वीडियो आगे निकल जाता है और आवाज़ पीछे रह जाती है। ऐसा लगता है कि आवाज़ और वीडियो दोनों अलग-अलग ट्रैक पर चल रहे हैं।"

एप्लिकेशन का धीमा चलना (App Lagging): "जब मैं YouTube ऐप खोलता हूँ, तो वह बहुत धीरे काम करता है। वीडियो लोड होने में बहुत समय लगता है। वीडियो पर क्लिक करने के बाद स्क्रीन खाली दिखती है और वीडियो शुरू नहीं होता। ऐप का इंटरफ़ेस भी ठीक से काम नहीं करता।"
creator: singharyan00933

title: मैं YouTube पर वीडियो चलाता हूँ, तो वो हर 5 सेकंड पर रुकता है और buffering करता है, जबकि इंटरनेट ठीक से चल रहा है।"
content:
समस्या: "YouTube पर वीडियो चलाने में हमेशा दिक्कत होती है।"

इसे और बेहतर तरीके से कैसे बता सकते हैं:

वीडियो का अटक-अटक कर चलना (Choppy Playback): "YouTube पर कोई भी वीडियो चलाता हूँ, तो वह लगातार नहीं चलता। वीडियो रुक-रुक कर चलता है, जैसे कोई अटक-अटक कर बोल रहा हो। ऐसा लगता है कि वीडियो आगे-पीछे हो रहा है और स्मूथली नहीं चल रहा।"

बफरिंग की समस्या (Buffering Issues): "जब मैं कोई वीडियो शुरू करता हूँ, तो वह तुरंत नहीं चलता। स्क्रीन पर बीच में एक गोल घूमने वाला निशान (Buffering icon) आता रहता है। वीडियो कुछ सेकंड चलता है, फिर रुक जाता है, फिर बफर होता है, और यह चक्र बार-बार चलता रहता है। इससे वीडियो देखने का मज़ा खराब हो जाता है।"

वीडियो की क्वालिटी का बार-बार बदलना (Changing Video Quality): "मैंने वीडियो को 1080p (हाई क्वालिटी) पर सेट किया है, लेकिन कुछ देर बाद वह अपने आप कम क्वालिटी (जैसे 480p या 360p) पर चला जाता है। स्क्रीन धुंधली हो जाती है। फिर थोड़ी देर बाद क्वालिटी ठीक हो जाती है, और फिर से खराब हो जाती है।"

आवाज़ और वीडियो का तालमेल बिगड़ना (Audio-Video Sync Issues): "वीडियो चल रहा है, लेकिन उसकी आवाज़ वीडियो से मैच नहीं कर रही। कभी आवाज़ पहले आ जाती है और वीडियो बाद में चलता है, या वीडियो आगे निकल जाता है और आवाज़ पीछे रह जाती है। ऐसा लगता है कि आवाज़ और वीडियो दोनों अलग-अलग ट्रैक पर चल रहे हैं।"

एप्लिकेशन का धीमा चलना (App Lagging): "जब मैं YouTube ऐप खोलता हूँ, तो वह बहुत धीरे काम करता है। वीडियो लोड होने में बहुत समय लगता है। वीडियो पर क्लिक करने के बाद स्क्रीन खाली दिखती है और वीडियो शुरू नहीं होता। ऐप का इंटरफ़ेस भी ठीक से काम नहीं करता।"

इन सभी बातों को विस्तार से बताने से किसी को भी समस्या समझने में आसानी होगी। इससे यह पता चलता है कि "कुछ गड़बड़ है" कहने के बजाय आप "क्या गड़बड़ है" और "यह कैसे हो रहा है" यह बता रहे हैं। Agar Ham koi bhi Ang khelte Hain to network ka problem aata Hai

title: Menus and tooltips in wrong places
content:
Hi,

When I first open Firefox, everything will be normal. But after opening a menu (e.g. dropdown from the bookmarks bar, or downloads menu next to address bar) for the second or maybe more time, the menu will show up in the wrong location, maybe halfway across or down the screen. I am usually able to bring my mouse over to where it is shown and click the buttons, although sometimes the buttons show a hover animation when my mouse is where they are *supposed* to be and I must reopen the menu to be able to interact with the buttons where they are actually shown. Contracting the window fixes the problem, but it comes right back when I maximize the window. It will also happen with tooltips, such as the name of a tab when I hover over it.

I am using Fedora 42 GNOME Wayland with two monitors, one at 125% scaling and other at 100% scaling; the issue happens on both, but independently of each other. I have tried enabling the Firefox setting for fractional scaling, but nothing was fixed. Any way to make menus show up where they are supposed to?
creator: lego_iready
